fullplot: When the others leave for the night, the last mortician begins to fondle the corpses. He quickly moves to the corpse of a young woman who died in a car crash, tearing her clothes off and mutilating her body. He then mounts her and rapes her corpse while taking pictures with a camera and timer. He brings her heart back home to his dog for food.
plot: A short film wherein a man working in a morgue mutilates and defiles one of the corpses. He takes the heart home to his dog.
title: Aftermath
